parts.part1: Think California winters are all sunshine and palm trees? Think again. Freezing mornings, unexpected rain, and chilly nights catch locals off guard every year.
parts.part2: Stay prepared with WeatherReady's California winter collection. Lightweight layers that handle anything Mother Nature throws your way. Shop now and stay comfortable all season.
parts.fullScript:
Think California winters are all sunshine and palm trees? Think again. Freezing mornings, unexpected rain, and chilly nights catch locals off guard every year.

Stay prepared with WeatherReady's California winter collection. Lightweight layers that handle anything Mother Nature throws your way. Shop now and stay comfortable all season.
